sourceMeaningMnemonic: This <radical>horse</radical> may look <radical>odd</radical> but it’s actually perfect for <kanji>horse riding</kanji>!
meaningInfo: Look at this odd horse. It's a little odd-looking, but it turned its quirks into strengths and now it's an exceptional horse for horse riding!
readingMnemonic: Before <kanji>horse riding</kanji>, you’ll need the <reading>key</reading> (<ja>き</ja>) to access the stable and let out the odd horse you'll be riding.
readingInfo: Want to ride the odd horse? Then, you must have the key to open its stable!
